content.rendered:
[vc_row center_row=”yes”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

BoxHub Cargo Containers Trading LLC is one of the largest cargo container trading companies based in the Middle East. We purchase and sell used and brand new shipping containers for all industries.

Besides hosting a shipping container trading platform, BoxHub Cargo Containers also provides inspection and survey services strictly adhering to the rules and regulations mandated by the IICL. Our licensed inspectors, certified by the Institute of International Container Lessors (IICL), will go over the containers and the concerned documents with a fine-tooth comb to make them sea-ready.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”452″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row match_height=”yes” bg_type=”bg_color” css=”.vc_custom_1624241401116{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”left-to-right” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1626931052754{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ el_class=”partbox1″]

QUALITY PRODUCTS

We are the one of the largest sellers and the purchasers of every kind of used and New equipment.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”appear” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1626931063184{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ el_class=”partbox2″]
TRUSTED SALES

We have the experience and expertise to ensure that our customers have the benefits.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”right-to-left” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1626931074181{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ el_class=”partbox1″]
PROFESSIONAL TEAM

We have a dedicated and efficient team of professionals, who are fully conversant with all aspects of container.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”appear” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1626931083802{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ el_class=”partbox2″]
CUSTOMER SUPPORT

Just let us know your needs.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1624241836215{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”451″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]
Container Trading

We sell all types of shipping containers at very competitive prices in Middle East. We are the largest stockiest for all kinds of new and used ISO containers in the Middle East. We have several multinational corporations as our sourcing partners for over 10 years which gives us access to quality containers for trading. In addition to ISO containers, we also stock DNV offshore containers & Flatpack office containers.

Container Leasing

We own 1000+ containers for domestic short and long term leasing to serve a variety of storage and shipping purposes. Both dry and refrigerated containers are included in our collection. To maintain high-quality, all our containers in the leasing fleet are replaced every 5 years.
They are thoroughly inspected after every lease and serviced if needed by our certified dry and reefer repair technicians. We offer container rentals, handling, and trucking as a package anywhere in the UAE. Containers are leased out for a minimum period of 30days.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1624241844005{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]
Trucking (Shipping)

Boxhub provides trucking services in the UAE and from the Emirates to GCC and Levant. We offer a wide variety of fleet which ensures a one window option for clients.
â€œWe value time and safety more than the freight chargesâ€ A customer satisfaction based policy has driven us during all these years.

Depot Services

Our centrally located facility in Dubai provides advantageous depot servicing for multinational leasing and shipping companies.

  • A modern and spacious facility with computerized equipment control systems
  • A fully equipped repair and service bay for containers and reefers
  • Ongoing servicing including container inspection, reporting, estimation and repairs
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”453″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1624241938789{margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”454″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]
Survey Services

Shipping containers have to undergo thorough inspection and survey mandated by the IICL before they can be used. We will lend you a hand with that. Our Institute of International Container Lessors (IICL) certified inspectors will make sure that everything is strictly in accordance with the rules and regulations stipulated by the IICL.
They will also scan the container for damage, wear, and non-conforming repairs. The cleanliness of the containers is ensured to leave no room for contamination, residue, debris, or infestation that may prove lethal for both humans and cargos in the long run. The containers are visually inspected from the top, bottom, and sides for exterior dents, bulges, holes, missing bungs, rust, or other signs of leakage. Container expiration/replacement date will be stamped on the container.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” center_row=”yes” typo_style=”light” css=”.vc_custom_1622514844647{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”quoteclass”][vc_column typo_style=””][vc_custom_heading text=”GET A QUOTE” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]
